title: Zoo Olympics
creator_credit: Picha, Eric Van Beuren, Francis Nielsen, Y C Alligatorfilm and Rooster Studio
brief_description: Drawn by French animator Picha, here are 26 episodes of the hilarious animal Olympics antics. These are parodies of Olympic events, based vaguely on behaviours in the animal kingdom, such as egg laying and rolling (chickens), slop slurping (pigs) and kangaroo boxing.
creator_credit_for_label: Picha, Eric Van Beuren, Francis Nielsen, Y C Alligatorfilm and Rooster Studio
